title: IMAX Rocky Mountain Express 2011 BDRip 1080p Legendado PT-BR
description:
Audio: English
Legendas/subtitles: PortuguÃªs / English (MKV track)

=================================================
In "Rocky Mountain Express" we follow Canadian Pacific 2816 (The Empress), a restored steam engine from the 1930s, along the CPR line through the mountains from Vancouver to Calgary in summertime. The viewer is treated to close-ups of the train's operation and views of the stunning landscape, consisting mostly of pristine mountains, passes and river valleys.
When blown up to IMAX proportions, those photos take on a life of their own.
=================================================

O filme apresenta fotografias aÃ©reas do trem e do terreno montanhoso por onde ele passa. Recursos grÃ¡ficos ajudam a entender o mapa geogrÃ¡fico por onde a linha foi construÃ­da. Destaque para a trilha sonora de "500 miles".
